thread.title: Jurors reach verdict on life or death for Colorado movie gunman

author: Expert
title: Jurors reach verdict on life or death for Colorado movie gunman
text:
US domesticNews Expert 
CENTENNIAL, Colo. (Reuters) â€“ Jurors deliberating on whether gunman James Holmes should be executed for the Colorado cinema massacre reached a verdict on Friday after watching a video of the body-strewn theater recorded after he killed 12 people and wounded 70 inside a midnight screening of a Batman film.
